'''Resin brick stairs''' are a [[Resin Bricks|resin brick]] variant of [[stairs]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Resin brick stairs can be mined using a [[pickaxe]]. When mined without a pickaxe, it drops nothing.

{{breaking row|Resin Brick Stairs|Pickaxe|Wood|horizontal=1}}

=== Crafting ===

}}

=== Stonecutting ===
{{Stonecutting
|Resin Bricks
|Resin Brick Stairs
}}
=== Note Blocks ===
Resin brick stairs can be placed under [[Note Block|note blocks]] to produce "bass drum" sounds.
